intent_status_description: A payload for this transaction has been accepted into a node's mempool on the network. It's possible but not certain that it will be committed to this network.

known_payloads.payload_status_description: This particular payload for this transaction has been accepted into a node's mempool on the network. It's possible but not certain that it will be committed to this network.
known_payloads.handling_status_reason: Submitting to the network due to being submitted to Gateway
